desc.tooltip: input to Vertex and Fragment shader from OpenGL or application (READ-ONLY)
input per-vertex to Vertex shader from OpenGL or application (READ-ONLY)

ensures all calculations of this variable result in identical values across programs

copied out on return, but not initialized
